meanings.sent1: They will telecast the game live on TV.
meanings.sent2: The news channel will telecast the press conference tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if they will telecast the cat show on TV.
meanings.sent4: The magic show was telecasted to every home in the country.
meanings.sent5: The concert was telecasted in high definition for everyone to enjoy.

meanings.sent1: I missed the telecast of the award ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The telecast of the movie was interrupted by a technical glitch.
meanings.sent3: The telecast of the cooking competition made me hungry.

meanings.sent5: The telecast of the documentary was informative and engaging.
